title: Are any medal of honor recipients from World War 2 still alive? - Quora

response.answer_text: Among the living Medal of Honor recipients are three (now only 1) soldiers: Robert Dale Maxwell, 97; Died 2019 Charles Henry Coolidge, 96; and Francis “Frank” Currey, 92. Died 2019 The sole surviving Marine Corps recipient is Hershel “Woody” Williams, 94. Mar 29, 2018

Of the 70 living recipients, two earned their Medals of Honor in World War II: Sergeant Charles H. Coolidge Warrant Officer Hershel W. Williams This page was last edited on 18 April 2020 List of living Medal of Honor recipients - Wikipedia

I met a Bronze Star recipient, a former WWII US paratrooper, just six or so years ago, in Branson Missouri, I got to shake his hand and we even prayed together, though I do not know if he is still alive today.
